title: Deals: Samsung ANC Galaxy Buds Live hit $90, first Galaxy S22 Ultra S-View Flip Cover discounts, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by Samsung’s ANC Galaxy Buds Live earbuds dropping to $90. That’s alongside the Assistant-enabled Lenovo Smart Frame at $230 and the first discounts on Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 Ultra S-View Flip Covers. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…
